subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Roger Federer reclaimed his hometown title from Novak Djokovic, winning the Swiss Indoors final, 6-4, 3-6, 6-1, on Sunday in Basel.
snippet: Top-seeded Roger Federer reclaimed his hometown title from Novak Djokovic, winning the Swiss Indoors final, 6-4, 3-6, 6-1, on Sunday in Basel.
